author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10009629

Dreams of Another will launch on October 10!
On the same day, PixelJunk Eden 2 comes to PS4/PS5!
A special bundle including both titles is now available for pre-order!

Dreams of Another is a third-person exploration-action game built around the philosophical theme: "No Creation Without Destruction." Unlike traditional TPS games where shooting destroys objects, here, shooting materializes and creates from an otherwise abstract, fragmented world.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Dreams of Another - Launch Date Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

#ps5 #ps5games
title: A-RED Walking Robot - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
The 2.5D puzzle-platformer set in a Cold War-era nuclear facility, NODE: The Last Favor of the Antarii, is coming to PlayStation!

A ruined world filled with radiation and secrets. At its center stands one AI, caught between salvation and collapse. Explore Toska — a haunting nuclear labyrinth where the past and something otherworldly collide. Can you overcome the unknown and save us all?

Welcome to NODE: The Last Favor of the Antarii — a 2.5D puzzle-platformer set in a collapsing Soviet nuclear facility.
Take control of NODE, an autonomous AI, and investigate the ruins perched on the edge of catastrophe. Plan your actions, execute commands in sequence, and solve timeline-based puzzles as you uncover a cosmic mystery that may determine the fate of humanity.
Every choice shapes the story. Every retry sharpens your strategy.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: NODE: The Last Favor of the Antarii - Coming Soon Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Add now to your wishlist: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10014182

Follow Mai on her journey through a shattered world as she searches for her identity and the origin of the mysterious creatures that threaten the balance of the universe.

Venture through past and future, exploring mysterious dungeons, and uncover the bond that ties Mai to the enigmatic figure who will guide her throughout the adventure, teaching her the mastery of the arcane Uroboro Stone.

The gameplay mechanics evolve seamlessly, shifting from precision platforming to hack and slash combat, adapting to the era you explore.

Through countless journeys across time, you will forever reshape the fate of the primordial universe, giving birth to an entirely new reality.

Will Mai and her enigmatic ally have the strength to correct the mistakes of the past?

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Mai: Child of Ages - Announce Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Magic erupts in Echoes of the End 

The Extended Gameplay Trailer offers an immersive look at the breathtaking world of Aema from early in the story, introducing Ryn's early abilities alongside glimpses at the enemy types, traversal challenges, and environmental encounters that later chapters and upgrades expand upon.

Driven by themes of trust, sacrifice and redemption, the story unfolds across ten hand-crafted chapters filled with cinematic moments, memorable characters and high-stakes decisions. 

Echoes of the End launches on PlayStation 5 on August 12

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Echoes of the End - Extended Gameplay Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Killing Floor 3 launches Globally for PS5® on July 24, 2025.  
Pre-Order Today: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/EP0114-PPSA08427_00-KF3GAME000000001

The Battle Begins at Nightfall. 

It’s 2091. Join up with Nightfall, the last line of defense against megacorp Horzine’s inhuman army of monstrous zeds. The future is in your hands… if you can survive long enough to reach it.

Killing Floor 3 is the next installment in the legendary action/horror series. This intense FPS puts you in the boots of a Nightfall specialist joining forces with up to five teammates to battle waves of Zeds, earn dosh, unlock skills, and build the ultimate arsenal.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Killing Floor 3 - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

description:
The Wandering Village is out now on PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4!
https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/concept/10011185/

In this unique city-building game, you must build and manage a village on the back of a giant wandering creature. Grow crops, shelter your villagers, and form a symbiotic relationship with the ancient beast as you traverse a post-apocalyptic world reclaimed by nature.

Start your journey today and lead your people to survival!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games

author: PlayStation
description:
Resolve RoboCop’s Unfinished Business: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10014077

RoboCop is back and this time, his target is the OmniTower. In this high-octane standalone follow-up to Rogue City, mercenaries have holed up in OCP’s latest pet project, turning each floor into a maze of turrets, traps, and bullets. You’ll need to fight your way to the top to stop their plan to seize control of all OCP technology, including RoboCop himself.
Featuring new weapons, enemies, and a brand-new story, Unfinished Business dives deeper into the past of Alex Murphy through a series of vignettes with unique gameplay styles that will see you play as Murphy during his time as a beat cop, and as ED-209.
Are you ready to tackle the OmniTower?

The climb starts now in RoboCop: Rogue City – Unfinished Business, available on PlayStation 5.

Rated Mature
title: RoboCop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games
